Clubs and Activities

What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
I never feel like I'm in danger while on campus.
Intramural activities are great to get involved in.
There's a rock near Kilkawly Center that is always painted by the different fraternities and sororities.
The rec center is an awesome resource for students to take advantage of. There are also many intramural activities to take part in that are fun.
There are multiple places on campus to eat from Jimmy John's to Inner Circle Pizza. There are other fast food restaurants on campus so there will be a large variety.
I haven't lived in the dorms so I don't actually know how the dorms are. But I've heard multiple good things about the dorms.
Since YSU is the only university I've attended I don't have anything to compare it to. So far I haven't found any classes to rigorous.
Make sure you keep up on all of your school work. Being organized is essential to succeeding in college. Also get involved on campus so your able to enjoy college experience.
YSU provides a great value for your money. You receive a very good education for a relatively low cost in comparison to other universities. I'm extremely satisfied with my experience at YSU so far.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Sarah from Grafton, OH 08/30/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 3 of 69 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Youngstown State University is great for a number of different students. I am a part of their Education program and it is a very well organized program and the professors in it are very helpful and love what they are doing which makes class quite enjoyable. I recommend it for Education majors. Tips for prospective students Have fun. Get involved. You will get the most of your college experience by getting involved with clubs, organizations and even a job on campus. Take time from school to relax and enjoy yourself. Not only will you have fun but it will help you with school by controlling your stress. Don't be afraid to ask questions, either in class or outside of class. That's what professors are here for. Bang for the buck
